Hero.title: <highlight>You shoot</highlight>, we handle the rest.
Hero.description: You shoot, upload, and share a QR code. Every guest finds their own photos using AI face search.

Metadata.title: FrameFast - Event Photo Distribution
Metadata.description: AI-powered face recognition photo distribution platform for photographers and event organizers.

faceSearch.label: Face search
faceSearch.title: Guests find themselves in seconds.
faceSearch.description: Upload your photos. Guests scan a QR, take a selfie, and AI returns their matches instantly.

features.privacy: Guests only see their own photos

lineDelivery.label: LINE delivery
lineDelivery.title: Photos delivered straight to LINE.
lineDelivery.description: Guests send a selfie in LINE and receive their matched photos instantly, no app to download, no website to visit.

colorGrading.label: Auto color grading
colorGrading.title: Your signature look, on every photo.
colorGrading.description: Upload a LUT once. Every photo gets your color grade automatically, no manual editing, consistent results.

features.upload: Upload your own LUT or generate from a reference image

dashboard.label: Organizer UI
dashboard.title: One platform for your entire event workflow.
dashboard.description: Create events, upload photos, and track credits. Less time on logistics, more time behind the camera.

IosApp.label: iOS app
IosApp.title: Capture, sync, and deliver from your pocket.
IosApp.description: Import from camera, monitor upload status, and keep event delivery moving while you are still on-site.
